sentences.en: An unequivocal answer to this question can only be given for one system at present.
sentences.cn: 对这个问题确切的回答,在目前只有一种体系.

sentences.en: And the academic view was unequivocal: the most talented artists used oil.
sentences.cn: 而学院派的看法也是不可动摇的: 画油画的艺术家才是最有才华的.

sentences.en: Bruce can no longer count on unequivocal backing upstairs.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯已经不能再指望高层总是为他撑腰了.

sentences.en: Experiments are not totally unequivocal as yet.
sentences.cn: 实验至今还不完全明朗.

sentences.en: Franz complimented Albert, who looked at himself in the glass with an unequivocal smile of satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 弗兰兹向阿尔贝恭维了一番, 阿尔贝自己也对着镜子照了照,脸上带着踌躇满志的微笑.
他的回答是毫不含糊的“不”。

sentences.en: On the whole, their tone was unequivocal.
sentences.cn: 他们的调子基本上是明确的.

sentences.en: Our position on this issue is consistent, unequivocal and resolute.
sentences.cn: 我们在这一问题上的立场是一贯 、 明确和坚定的.

sentences.en: Taken together, that is hardly an unequivocal sign of economic vigour.
sentences.cn: 因此综合来看, 这很难算得上经济活力的明确迹象.
报告中传达的信息是明确的。

sentences.en: The unequivocal flatness of the countryside came almost as a shock.
sentences.cn: 那一带一望无际的平原,看上去简直令人吃惊.

sentences.en: We must secure from the British unequivocal reaffirmation.
sentences.cn: 我们必须从英国取得无歧异的再确认.

sentences.en: We were unequivocal in response to the third question.
sentences.cn: 我们毫不含糊地回答了第三个问题.

sentences.en: Well the answer is an unequivocal and emphatic " Yes. "
sentences.cn: 我想答案是坚定有力的 “ 咱们能 ” .

sentences.en: Yesterday, the message to him was unequivocal: "Get out."
sentences.cn: 昨天，给他的信息很明确：“滚开。”
你的用意必须明确无误.

trans.tran_cn: 不含糊的，明确的，毫不含糊
trans.tran_en: completely clear and without any possibility of doubt
